slogan: The Ravaged Town of the Past

サファリゾーンゲート

slogan: A town that can't be shaded any hue.
The city probing the integration of nature and science.
A tiny island in the blue sea.
The port where people and Pokémon cross paths with nature.
The bright and shiny city of fun!
The windswept highlands with the sweet fragrance of grass.
A farm community with small gardens.
The treetop city that frolics with nature.
Where the land ends and the sea begins.
The mystical city where history slumbers.
Where the morning sun smiles upon the waters.
The paradise of flowers, the sea, and Pokémon
Lit by the Flash of Lightning!
Sky Glittering with Flowers of Snow
The Pokémon League is every Trainer's greatest challenge!
A town whose flower is about to bloom.
A town where you can taste the ages.
The city where bay and butte are bound.
A town where fluff dances on the wind.
The starry city marking the hours.
A kind, sweet, and exquisite city.
The place where we give thanks to Pokémon.
A city overflowing with gentle joy.
A town that always welcomes visitors.
The place we built with our Pokémon.
The holy ground for Battle Royal enthusiasts.
A town that welcomes the sea breeze.
You're in Team Skull Territory Now!
A farming town since days of old, where people and their Pokémon live in close harmony.
Our quiet borough is home to the esteemed Pokémon Research Lab.
An industrial city studded with steam-powered marvels of modern engineering.
A town nestled within the nurturing bowl of our many terraced farming fields.
A bustling seaport that many visit to see its lively market stalls and famed restaurant!
A city of great history, living and thriving within castle walls that date back to the Middle Ages.
A vibrant town that has grown up around an ancient mural tucked away in the mountains.
A charming town where the people make their homes among the trunks of the towering trees.
Buildings from an age long gone still stand about the steaming hot spring that covers the town.
This rocking town has a punk vibe and streets crammed with shops lined up cheek by jowl.
This booming metropolis was designed and developed by our very own Chairman Rose.
